hero.description: Punjab's most comprehensive disaster preparedness platform - combining interactive risk mapping, gamified safety education, virtual emergency drills, and life-saving tools for students across the state.

features.subtitle: From interactive learning to real emergency response - everything Punjab's students need for comprehensive disaster readiness.

feature1.title: Interactive Disaster Maps
feature1.desc: Explore Punjab-specific flood zones, industrial hotspots, and fire-sensitive areas with real-time data visualization.

feature2.title: Gamified Learning
feature2.desc: Master disaster safety through engaging games, quizzes, and dynamic leaderboards with rewards and badges.

feature3.title: Virtual Drill Engine
feature3.desc: Practice earthquake, flood, and fire responses with teacher-triggered real-time drills for structured readiness.

innovation1.title: AI-Powered Learning
innovation1.desc: Adaptive learning paths that adjust to individual progress and learning styles for maximum retention.

innovation2.title: Admin Dashboard
innovation2.desc: Real-time analytics, student progress tracking, and institutional disaster readiness metrics.

about.title: About
about.p: This project builds preparedness across Punjab using community-led approaches.
